about:
quranesk.com

This website is an effort to present researchers and readers with a comprehensive collection of Quranic audio and textual material all by Shia authors and reciters. All the material on this website is presented in a verse by verse (and some in a word by word) format - from commentaries to translations and transliteration, whether in text or in audio. This, coupled with the extremely user-friendly interface and beautiful design and the richness of content, will inshaAllah be a great alternative to the mainstream Quranic websites that purposefully avoid including our translations and recitations. The languages in which Shia translations are available here cover 99% of the Shia population.

 

This website offers:

 

  • 30 translations in 10 languages by Shia authors
  • Translations exclusive to this website - some being not available online
  • Verse by verse audio by 5 different Shia reciters
  • Surah by Surah audio by 12 different Shia reciters
  • 2 simple commentaries in English by Shia authors 
  • Whole Tafseere Namoona in Urdu by Ayatollah Makarem Shirazi 
  • Word by word translation in 10 languages (not Shia though)
  • 5 Farsi audio verse by verse translations 
  • Gharaati verse by verse audio commentary (Farsi) (comming soon)
  • Font by a Shia calligrapher (Hussaini Nastaliq)
  • Ability to view Quranic text in Uthmani or Indopak writing.

 

This humble work is dedicated to Imam Ali ibn Musa al-Ridha
